It is also 37 * requested that these non-binding requests be included along with the 38 * license above. 39 */ 40 46 #include "portaudio.h" 47 #include "pa_win_waveformat.h" 48 49 #ifdef __cplusplus 50 extern "C" 51 { 52 #endif /* __cplusplus */ 53 54 55 #define paWinDirectSoundUseLowLevelLatencyParameters (0x01) 56 #define paWinDirectSoundUseChannelMask (0x04) 57 58 59 typedef struct PaWinDirectSoundStreamInfo{ 60 unsigned long size; 61 PaHostApiTypeId hostApiType; 62 unsigned long version; 64 unsigned long flags; 76 unsigned long framesPerBuffer; 77 85 PaWinWaveFormatChannelMask channelMask; 86 87 }PaWinDirectSoundStreamInfo; 88 89 90 91 #ifdef __cplusplus 92 } 93 #endif /* __cplusplus */ 94 95 #endif /* PA_WIN_DS_H */
